title: Gorillaz - Best Songs Compilation
description: Playlist: 0:20 1-Tomorrow comes today 3:43 2-Clint Eastwood 9:56 3-Sound check 14:48 4-Rock the house 19:07 5-Dirty Harry 23:01 6-Feel good inc. 26:51 7-El ma単ana 30:51 8-Every planet we reach is dead 35:55 9-Rhinestone eyes 39:25 10-Stylo 44:08 11-Broken 47:33 12-Some kind of nature ----------------------------------------足---------------- Hi People! I truly love this group so I decided to make a compilation of some of my favourite songs by them. (totally needless to say, they were chosen by personal opinion). I know there aren't any songs from The Fall, D-Sides, Laika come Home, etc. in this compilation. There are tons of songs that I simply love from Gorillaz, maybe even all of them, but I just can't include them all in one video: it'd make it way too long and unlikely for people to watch it. I picked 12 songs, 4 from Gorillaz, 4 from Demon Days and 4 from Plastic Beach. Hope you enjoy! Some other great songs by them in my opinion: Kids with guns, Dare, White flag, Empire ants, Pirate Jet, Plastic Beach, To binge, On melancholy hill, Faust, Rockit, Revolving Doors, Hillbilly man, Shy-Town, Amarillo, Aspen Forest, Dracula, Spitting out the demons, People, Hong Kong, We are happy landfill. You should go check those out if you liked the ones that were featured in this video. ----------------------------------------足---------------- I dont own any of the songs in this video. All credits go to EMI and Gorillaz, if you like their music please support them. Official page: http://gorillaz.com/ Official store: http://gorillaz.fanfire.com/cgi-bin/W... ----------------------------------------足---------------- Thanks for so many views and likes, I'm honestly stunned!
